pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, April 26, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister, joined by Member of Parliament for Guelph Lloyd Longfield, will participate in a virtual roundtable on housing and homelessness.

Closed to media.

2:20 p.m. The Prime Minister, joined by Minister of Fisheries, Oceans and the Canadian Coast Guard Bernadette Jordan and Parliamentary Secretary to the Minister of Infrastructure and Communities Andy Fillmore, will participate in a virtual discussion with representatives from Shelter Nova Scotia, Mi’kmaw Native Friendship Centre, and Coordinated Access South Shore Association to discuss new investments in housing from Budget 2021.

Closed to media.

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Closed to media.
